Master Answer:
ImmunizeBC's Q&A is intended for members of the public, not health care providers. Please refer to the BC Centre for Disease Control website.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: Flu season generally ends in March but can last until May. Is there a policy about how long flu immunizations are required based on this timeline.  Would nursing staff in a residential care facility who are hired in April be required to get the flu shot before they can start work that same April?
